title: How can I report a system TYPO to Google?
content:
I cringe each time I see the notification "[App Name] got your location in the background" – because it's grammatically incorrect!

Ask a coder – precision of language is important. So... It *GOT* your location?! The right word here is "has" – HAS your location. A real Android would never make this mistake!

I won't adjust my nerd glasses about "got" – look it up on the Googles. For a system push, it's simply wrong. 

This may not seem like a big deal, but to me it doesn't seem like a big deal to correct. Same number of characters, improved meaning. In the meantime, I can't stand gotting a phone that doesn't speak my language.
